StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruiter]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @RecruiterID as uniqueiden..er ) AS
SELECT r.RecruiterID as RECRUITER_ID, p.PersonID as PERSON_ID, p.FirstName as FIRST_NAME, p.MiddleName as MIDDLE_NAME, p.LastName as LAST_NAME, p.SSN, r.Organiza.onID as ORGANIZATION_ID, r.RankID as RANK_ID, r.BilletID as BILLET_ID, r.BilletBeginDate as BILLET_BEGIN_DATE, r.BilletEndDate as BILLET_END_DATE, r.BilletMOS as BILLET_MOS, r.PrimaryMOS as PRIMARY_MOS, r.TourBeginDate as TOUR_BEGIN_DATE, r.TourEndDate as TOUR_END_DATE, r.Es.matedTourEndDate as EST_TOUR_END_DATE, ps.MonthCode as MONTH_CODE, ps.CalendarYear as CALENDAR_YEAR, ps.OnProduc.on as ON_PRODUCTION, ps.NonProduc.onReasonCode as NON_PROD_REASON_CODE, ps.OtherReasonDetail as OTHER_REASON_DETAIL FROM [dbo].[Recruiter] r inner join [dbo].Person P on p.PersonID = r.PersonID le. outer join [dbo].Produc.onStatusHistory ps on ps.Produc.onStatusHistoryID = r.CurrentProduc.onStatusHistoryID WHERE r.RecruiterID = @RecruiterID
